reviews.review:
O primeiro jogo que eu zerei no computador, em um notebook Hp nada gamer, foi Half Life, indicação de um amigo. Se esse jogo é surpreendente até hoje, imagina para a época do seu lançamento. Quando criei a Steam, Half Life 2 era meu objetivo primário de compra.

Tenho nem palavras para descrever esse jogo, é surpreendente, encantador com os cenários, campanha fenomenal, empolga o jogador com o enredo, destruições, e a história sempre sendo um dos pontos altos da franquia.

Não tem como não gostar da Alyx, com todo um clima que podia virar um romance com Gordon Freeman. O homem certo no lugar errado, pode fazer toda a diferença no mundo. Quero estar vivo para um possível Half-Life 3, colabora Valve.

I love Half-Life 2 is the best game of 2004.

I wish Half-Life 3 came out.

[b]完全主观评测[/b]
半条命2放到04年绝对是惊艳的，起源引擎的低要求高表现可以吹爆。
但是以现在的标准来看贴图假，射击感弱，npc蠢，ui倒是V社游戏一贯的简洁舒服。
因此不推荐游玩这款游戏，给我的游戏体验很差。毕竟它的意义早已不在于娱乐，而是作为一代人的情怀和历史的里程碑。
Segunda vez que lo juego, un juegazo, yo creo que uno de los mejores de todos los tiempos.
Only driving a hovercraft was fun, boring game, first one was better than this. 7/10.

Half-Life 2? 

Surely I don't need to talk about why half-life 2 is one of the best sequels and games of all time.

Surely I don't. 

The groundbreaking physics engine and the games' dedication to making the most of it should show it had so much heart. 

The memorable and likeable cast of characters should be able to tell everyone how talented this game is.

The incredible world building, fantastic story, and the games ability to mix story and gameplay together without breaking the flow often should be able to show how well put together the game is.

The magnficient gunplay (and gravity gun) as well as the amazing level design and enemy placement should tell by themselves how fun Half-Life 2 is.

Surely I don't need to talk about it.

Surely I don't.

This is hard one for me. 6/10 I say. Recommended, but it's a very close call.

I've somehow missed all Half Life games, except from Half Life 1 demo, which I played as a kid years ago, so now I am trying to catch up with this legend. Half Life 1 was like a time trip, very satysfying old school game, but this one, I don't know. There is hughe improvement in certain aspects of the game, mainly characters and their backstories. First Half Life wasn't really about characters, it was "shoot all you see" most of the time. In this one I really enjoyed Alyx, Eli and others (mostly Alyx to be honest). Graphics is another improvement and it still looks okay in 2018 (well, if you are not 10 year old kid who has never seen anything older than Cry Engine 4). Also I like idea of world which turned into dystopian big brother something. What else? Vehicles were nice little addition to the game.
What brings this game down is terrible gunplay. Honestly, guns are so imbalanced, shotgun is your best friend here, SMG is way too weak, on longer ranges pistol is more accurate than anything else, you can only aim from hip, grenades are joke, explosion physics is another joke (it's funny how stuff after explosion is flying across the room like a crazy and bouncing numerous times hurting you), using grenade launcher or RPG from behind cover is epic fail cause it seems it doesn't matter how you aim, launched grenade or rocket will always explode immediatly so you will end up killing yourself etc... 
The biggest issue of HL 2 is artificial difficulty. In review of HL 1 I mentioned that enemies are occasionally spawning to your back, well HL2 is all about spawning enemies around you on whatever place you can't see at the moment. Spawn based system of enemies was literaly ruining whole game for me, I checked room and was like "okay, nobody there", then turned around and I was suddenly under fire from very same place I just checked. On some places spawn of enemies is infinite so it's just waste of ammo until you'll figure out that only way how to move on is run. They can hit you under insane angles with turret machine gun, while you have limited field of aim after mounting it. They can aim on you instantly through numerous obstacles and hit you even if tiny piece of you is not covered. On the other hand, you are recieving a lot of supplies, health and ammo everywhere you are so it's security break from game being too unfair and frustrating, however I still see this as poor game design. I can't say good things about AI either, after you'll get to part of game when you can command squad of rebels you'll find they are completely useles and they are just running around you, randomly shouting "follow the Freeman" or "I am reloading" (even though no single shot was fired) and having difficulty to aim on enemies, its just clueless running around and dying miserably most of the time. 

So, considering the fact this game is supposed to be a shooter, it does really poor job with guns. I guess Valve tried to make it challenging, but they couldn't think about anything different than putting the player into serious disadvantage. And after all of that, ending is ridiculously easy comparing to other parts of game. It's not that bad really, but HL 1 is whole another dimension, despite all characters and graphics in this one.

My first PC game, very good and fun. It took me 13 hours and 52 min to beat.

There were sometimes when i did not know where to go or what to do because they were not very obvious and i would spend around 5 minutes running around while i figure out what im supposed to do.

Overall i recommend it if you want to try this classic game and i see why its considered one of the best fps games of all time.

Lo que mas me gusta de este juego es que no es un simple fps en el que tenes que matar a todo lo que se te cruze y nada mas. Tiene muchos puzzles en los que tenes que usar la cabeza. Ninguno especialmente dificil pero si muy ingeniosos e intuitivos. Llega un punto en el que como ya hiciste varios te salen todos solos. Eso para mi es lo mejor que tiene este juego. Respecto al gunplay esta muy bien. Lo mismo con la variedad de armas y escenarios. Por ultimo la historia esta muy buena. Lastima que no nos digan mucho realmente sobre ella. Son puras insinuaciones.

I kept hearing people screaming for a HL3, and I had no idea what they were talking about. So I decided to buy HL2 to see what all the fuss is about. I was skeptical at first since I have never played an old game and didn't expect much but DAAAAAAAAMN DANIEL, BACK AT IT AGAIN WITH SURPISING THE CRAP OUT OF ME.
This is one of the best games I have played, better than most triple A games released today. Forget fancy graphics, this is the most story rich, largest map, and most interesting game I have ever played. The chase scene at the beggining lasted so long and is so awesome I am still not through with it (And don't want to be!). 
I now get what the hype is about, this is how game making is done. Look and weep people look and weep.

Half-Life 2 is a much different game than Half-Life. Not only are the gameplay and story much better, the graphics and other features of the source engine are much better. They are very good by today's standards, and excellent by the standards of its time. The ability to choose difficulty makes it easier for casual players and more challenging for experts. The Combine are very unique, because they use human soldiers rather than alien soldiers despite being from another universe. They also use synths, which are alien creatures modified by technology. Previous Xen creatures including headcrabs and Vortigaunts return. However, this time, the Vortigaunts are on our side. The lore is more in-depth than the previous game as well. While Half-Life was a good game that was slightly below average, Half-Life 2 is a great game far above average. It clears up the story of the other game and tells what happened in between the games. I recommend this game because it is much better than the original Half-Life, and it has more features.

Half-Life 2, uno cuando lo ve en ofertas a 12 mangos dice, bueno, me lo compro, son 12 pesos, no pasa nada si no me gusta, pero no va a pasar nada de todas formas, porque no va a estar malo, para nada.
Yo jamás había probado el Half-Life, lo conocía por oído nomas.

Empecemos, el juego tiene una historia que yo, personalmente, no conozco la 1era entrega (por ende no sé cómo empezó todo, los orígenes y todo eso), pero me gusto bastante, me atrapo y me dio ganas de seguirlo jugando (lo cual hice). Me gusta cómo se van generando sentimientos hacia los personajes que se presentan en la historia, llegándoles a agarrar cariño o desprecio. La ambientación está bien lograda y los gráficos son comunes, no esperen los del GTA 5 o algo así, son comunes.
Las físicas son buenas y están bien hechas, buena jugabilidad y controles (sencillos y comunes), tiene puzles entretenidos, bastantes horas de juego, y batallas interesantes contra enemigos de todo tipo.

Sinceramente no pensé que este juego estaría tan bueno, me cerró la boca, y eso se merece mucho reconocimiento. Totalmente recomendado. (Como recomendación para los que se lo vayan a comprar, háganlo cuando este en ofertas)
